httptoolkit/httptoolkit

Open-source tool to intercept, debug, and rewrite HTTP(S) traffic on any platform

View on index

Related repos

  • tool for monitoring and restricting HTTP/HTTPS requests from processes with network isolation
  • HTTP endpoints for testing clients and APIs
  • capture and modify HTTP(S) traffic for apps and devices
  • Mimics browser fingerprints to bypass bot detection
  • HTTP cache system for reverse proxies, supports plugins and RFC compliance
  • desktop HTTP/HTTPS proxy and packet capture tool for network debugging
  • eBPF-based tool for analyzing and capturing network traffic like HTTP, Redis, and MySQL requests
  • tool for testing HTTP headers and finding web vulnerabilities
  • Proxy server for forwarding HTTP(S) requests, debugging, and network monitoring
  • Web debugging proxy for macOS
